--- alter_table_alter_column.sql
alter table foo alter column foo string(256) not null
--- AST
&parser.AlterTable{
  pos:  0,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  12,
    end:  15,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &parser.AlterColumn{
    pos:  16,
    end:  53,
    Name: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  29,
      end:  32,
      Name: "foo",
    },
    Type: &parser.SizedSchemaType{
      pos:  33,
      end:  44,
      Name: "STRING",
      Max:  false,
      Size: &parser.IntLiteral{
        pos:   40,
        end:   43,
        Base:  10,
        Value: "256",
      },
    },
    NotNull: true,
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ALTER COLUMN foo STRING(256) NOT NULL
